Series.Actors: |Matt LeBlanc|Tamsin Greig|Stephen Mangan|Sophie Rundle|Richard Griffiths|Mircea Monroe|Kathleen Rose Perkins|John Pankow|
Series.Overview: After happily married couple Sean and Beverly Lincoln win yet another BAFTA Award for their successful British sitcom, Lymanâ€™s Boys, they are persuaded to move to Hollywood and remake their series for an American audience. Unfortunately the network starts to make changes, and the couple are forced to cast Matt LeBlanc in the lead role for the sitcom. A complicated triangle ensues, in which Sean likes Matt, while Beverly is less impressed. With continuing changes to the sitcom it threatens to damage the show, and other pressures result in a rough patch in their marriage.
